efile.title: NOKorp E-File for Open General
efile.description: E-File optimized for technically accurate WWII what-if scenarios able to go beyond 1945 (if you keep winning). It also has a fully developped naval part.
efile.author: None
efile.license: Creative Commons (CC SA-NC) license, Share-alike, Non-commercial. Credits go to the "Basekorps" and "LFX" E-Files.
